sqlMap.sql: select u.DUMP_ID, u.DUMP_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.DUMP_OUT_STORE_ID, u.DUMP_OUT_STORE_NO, u.DUMP_OUT_STORE_NAME, u.DUMP_OUT_STORAGE_FLAG, u.DUMP_IN_STORE_ID, u.DUMP_IN_STORE_NO, u.DUMP_IN_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG2, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.AUDIT_NAME, u.AUDIT_ID, NVL(u.PRINT_NUM,0)PRINT_NUM from DRP_DUMP u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_DUMP u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_DUMP( DUMP_ID, STORAGE_FLAG2, DUMP_OUT_STORE_NAME, DUMP_OUT_STORE_NO, REMARK, DUMP_IN_STORE_ID, DUMP_NO, BILL_TYPE, DUMP_OUT_STORE_ID, DUMP_OUT_STORAGE_FLAG, DUMP_IN_STORE_NO, DUMP_IN_STORE_NAME, STATE, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, DUMP_DATE, RELT_BILL_NO )values( #DUMP_ID#, #STORAGE_FLAG2#, #DUMP_OUT_STORE_NAME#, #DUMP_OUT_STORE_NO#, #REMARK#, #DUMP_IN_STORE_ID#, #DUMP_NO#, #BILL_TYPE#, #DUMP_OUT_STORE_ID#, #DUMP_OUT_STORAGE_FLAG#, #DUMP_IN_STORE_NO#, #DUMP_IN_STORE_NAME#, #STATE#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, to_date(#DUMP_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD'), #RELT_BILL_NO# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_DUMP
STORAGE_FLAG2 = #STORAGE_FLAG2# DUMP_OUT_STORE_NAME = #DUMP_OUT_STORE_NAME# DUMP_OUT_STORE_NO = #DUMP_OUT_STORE_NO# REMARK = #REMARK# DUMP_IN_STORE_ID = #DUMP_IN_STORE_ID# DUMP_NO = #DUMP_NO# BILL_TYPE = #BILL_TYPE# DUMP_OUT_STORE_ID = #DUMP_OUT_STORE_ID# DUMP_OUT_STORAGE_FLAG = #DUMP_OUT_STORAGE_FLAG# DUMP_IN_STORE_NO = #DUMP_IN_STORE_NO# DUMP_IN_STORE_NAME = #DUMP_IN_STORE_NAME# AUDIT_ID = #AUDIT_ID# AUDIT_NAME = #AUDIT_NAME# AUDIT_TIME = sysdate UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPD_TIME = sysdate DUMP_DATE = to_date(#DUMP_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') RELT_BILL_NO = #RELT_BILL_NO#
where DUMP_ID = #DUMP_ID#
sqlMap.delete:
update DRP_DUMP set UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME#,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR#,UPD_TIME=sysdate, DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG#
where DUMP_ID = #DUMP_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.DUMP_ID, u.DUMP_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.DUMP_OUT_STORE_ID, u.DUMP_OUT_STORE_NO, u.DUMP_OUT_STORE_NAME, u.DUMP_OUT_STORAGE_FLAG, u.DUMP_IN_STORE_ID, u.DUMP_IN_STORE_NO, u.DUMP_IN_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG2, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.AUDIT_NAME, u.AUDIT_ID, u.RELT_BILL_NO, to_char(u.DUMP_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') DUMP_DATE from DRP_DUMP u where u.DUMP_ID = #DUMP_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.DUMP_DTL_ID, u.DUMP_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.DUMP_OUT_STORG_ID, u.DUMP_OUT_STORG_NO, u.DUMP_OUT_STORG_NAME, u.DUMP_IN_STORG_ID, u.DUMP_IN_STORG_NO, u.DUMP_IN_STORG_NAME, u.DUMP_NUM, u.REMARK, u.DEL_FLAG, u.RELT_BILL_DTL_ID, b.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, b.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, b.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, temp.SAFE_NUM from DRP_DUMP_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH b on u.SPCL_TECH_ID = b.SPCL_TECH_ID left join DRP_DUMP t on u.DUMP_ID = t.DUMP_ID left join (select a.PRD_ID,b.STORE_NO,b.STORE_NAME,b.STORE_TYPE, sum(NVL(STORE_NUM,0)-NVL(FREEZE_NUM,0)) SAFE_NUM,a.LEDGER_ID,a.STORE_ID from DRP_STORE_ACCT a,DRP_STORE b where a.STORE_ID=b.STORE_ID group by a.PRD_ID,b.STORE_NO,b.STORE_NAME,b.STORE_TYPE,a.ledger_id,a.store_id) temp on u.PRD_ID = temp.PRD_ID and temp.STORE_ID = t.DUMP_OUT_STORE_ID
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_DUMP_DTL( DUMP_DTL_ID, DUMP_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, DUMP_OUT_STORG_ID, DUMP_OUT_STORG_NO, DUMP_OUT_STORG_NAME, DUMP_IN_STORG_ID, DUMP_IN_STORG_NO, DUMP_IN_STORG_NAME, DUMP_NUM, REMARK, DEL_FLAG, SPCL_TECH_ID, RELT_BILL_DTL_ID )values( #DUMP_DTL_ID#, #DUMP_ID#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #PRD_COLOR#, #BRAND#, #STD_UNIT#, #DUMP_OUT_STORG_ID#, #DUMP_OUT_STORG_NO#, #DUMP_OUT_STORG_NAME#, #DUMP_IN_STORG_ID#, #DUMP_IN_STORG_NO#, #DUMP_IN_STORG_NAME#, #DUMP_NUM#, #REMARK#, #DEL_FLAG#, #SPCL_TECH_ID#, #RELT_BILL_DTL_ID# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_DUMP_DTL
DUMP_DTL_ID = #DUMP_DTL_ID# PRD_ID = #PRD_ID# PRD_NO = #PRD_NO# PRD_NAME = #PRD_NAME# PRD_SPEC = #PRD_SPEC# PRD_COLOR = #PRD_COLOR# BRAND = #BRAND# STD_UNIT = #STD_UNIT# SPCL_TECH_ID = #SPCL_TECH_ID# DUMP_OUT_STORG_ID = #DUMP_OUT_STORG_ID# DUMP_OUT_STORG_NO = #DUMP_OUT_STORG_NO# DUMP_OUT_STORG_NAME = #DUMP_OUT_STORG_NAME# DUMP_IN_STORG_ID = #DUMP_IN_STORG_ID# DUMP_IN_STORG_NO = #DUMP_IN_STORG_NO# DUMP_IN_STORG_NAME = #DUMP_IN_STORG_NAME# DUMP_NUM = #DUMP_NUM# REMARK = #REMARK#
where DUMP_DTL_ID = #DUMP_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_DUMP_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where DUMP_DTL_ID in ($DUMP_DTL_IDS$)
update DRP_DUMP_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where DUMP_ID = #DUMP_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select u.DUMP_ID, u.DUMP_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.DUMP_OUT_STORE_ID, u.DUMP_OUT_STORE_NO, u.DUMP_OUT_STORE_NAME, u.DUMP_OUT_STORAGE_FLAG, u.DUMP_IN_STORE_ID, u.DUMP_IN_STORE_NO, u.DUMP_IN_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG2, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.AUDIT_NAME, u.AUDIT_ID, u.RELT_BILL_NO, to_char(u.DUMP_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') DUMP_DATE, d.PRD_NO, d.PRD_NAME, d.PRD_SPEC, d.BRAND, d.STD_UNIT, sp.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, sp.SPCL_DTL_REMARK, NVL(d.DUMP_NUM,0)DUMP_NUM, d.REMARK ROW_REMARK from DRP_DUMP u left join DRP_DUMP_DTL d on u.DUMP_ID = d.DUMP_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH sp on sp.SPCL_TECH_ID = d.SPCL_TECH_ID
u.DEL_FLAG=0 and d.DEL_FLAG=0 and
select DUMP_OUT_STORE_ID,DUMP_IN_STORE_ID from DRP_DUMP where DUMP_ID=#DUMP_ID#
select count(1) from DRP_DUMP_DTL where DUMP_ID=#DUMP_ID# and DEL_FLAG=0

select u.DUMP_DTL_ID RELT_BILL_DTL_ID, u.DUMP_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, NVL(u.PRD_SPEC,'')PRD_SPEC, NVL(u.PRD_COLOR,'')PRD_COLOR, NVL(u.BRAND,'')BRAND, NVL(u.STD_UNIT,'')STD_UNIT, u.DUMP_OUT_STORG_ID, u.DUMP_OUT_STORG_NO, u.DUMP_OUT_STORG_NAME, u.DUMP_IN_STORG_ID, u.DUMP_IN_STORG_NO, u.DUMP_IN_STORG_NAME, NVL(u.DUMP_NUM,0)DUMP_NUM, NVL(u.REMARK,'')REMARK, u.DEL_FLAG, b.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, NVL(u.SPCL_TECH_ID,'')SPCL_TECH_ID, NVL(b.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK,'')SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, NVL(b.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO,'')DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, NVL(temp.SAFE_NUM,0)SAFE_NUM from DRP_DUMP_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH b on u.SPCL_TECH_ID = b.SPCL_TECH_ID left join DRP_DUMP t on u.DUMP_ID = t.DUMP_ID left join (select a.PRD_ID,b.STORE_NO,b.STORE_NAME,b.STORE_TYPE, sum(NVL(STORE_NUM,0)-NVL(FREEZE_NUM,0)) SAFE_NUM,a.LEDGER_ID,a.STORE_ID from DRP_STORE_ACCT a,DRP_STORE b where a.STORE_ID=b.STORE_ID group by a.PRD_ID,b.STORE_NO,b.STORE_NAME,b.STORE_TYPE,a.ledger_id,a.store_id) temp on u.PRD_ID = temp.PRD_ID and temp.STORE_ID = t.DUMP_IN_STORE_ID where t.DUMP_NO = #RELT_BILL_NO# and t.DEL_FLAG=0 and u.DEL_FLAG=0
select to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(NVL(u.RELT_BILL_DTL_ID, ''))) RELT_BILL_DTL_IDS from DRP_DUMP_DTL u where u.RELT_BILL_DTL_ID is not null and u.DUMP_ID = #DUMP_ID# and u.DEL_FLAG=0
